content: *worked in lofty yarn and pretty colors this basic crocheted granny square blanket is the perfect baby gift since yarn is super bulky it won t take long to crochet red heart * skill level easy project number lw2486 yarnspirations item #rhc0202-022723m red heart® baby clouds™ art e710 solid color 6 oz 170 g 140 yd 128m a 1 skein 9724 pink lemonade b 2 skeins 9517 seaspray c 4 skeins 9311 cloud 3 colors 7 skeins total crochet hook u s size n-15 10mm yarn needle gauge square measures 6 in x 6 in square a make 18 square b make 17 sew squares together following assembly diagram finish with 2 rounds of edging
